pr_title: CB-9761 Do not check upgrade matrix for CM version

timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't it be better to set the imageFilterParams  checkUpgradeMatrix to false in case of CM instead of creating a different method where you can override it. It will be difficult to maintain later.
timeline.author: keyki

replies.bodyText: I agree that it may not be the best solution, but overriding the imageFilterParams for one call does not seems better. How about separating upgradePermissionProvider.permitCmAndStackUpgrade to 2 different methods? And in the cm method we do not care about the matrix.
replies.author: Bajzathd

timeline.message:
CB-9761 Do not check upgrade matrix for CM version
CDH and CM versions may be different from now on, so the upgrade matrix should only be used for CDH versions.
